MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the EH3 area of Edinburgh. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 6:14am. Our engineers have arrived onsite at the Dewar Place substation to investigate a suspected blown fuse and the team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 11:15am. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 8:47am on Sunday, 21 February 2021
